content.detailedDescription: Ive had many sightings of amber orbs over a 3 week period sitting on my back patio facing queen creek and east mesa area. they morph around the sky one will turn into 3 sometimes 6. others times two or three will hover for several minutes once a friend and i watched 2 hover for a half an hour. no explanation have called faa and surrounding airports.We were both in shock and awe as we knew we were witnessing something truly amazing. no fear whatsoever. they will turn off and on like they are still there but i just cant see them.
content.summary: Witnessed several orb over several days morphing around turning on and off

content.detailedDescription: Traveling north on i-94 about to head west on route 60 about ten minutes until 8pm on november 24, 2013. an oval passed from above the car out to the horizon (it never went over the horizon, but appeared to keep going into space) in about 2 seconds. i say oval, but i could tell it was actually the shape of a frisbee, but from my angle, it appeared to be an oval. we were about a half an hour north of o'hare airport, but it was moving way to fast to be a plane. and it was too big and had a solid white light that didn't blink or flare or leave a trail, so it couldn't have been a comet. it seemed to be about airplane height, i want to say 20,000 feet. but by the time it reached the horizon, it could have been anything higher than that. if a plane travels 500-600 mph, i would say it was 4 to 6 times faster then that. the best way to describe it was if i were laying on my back and a professional whipped a frisbee over my head. only difference is the object was clearly glowing and was very high in the air and huge. it was about the size of a skittle, maybe a little bigger from my perspective. as i wrote, it happened very fast, but as soon as it happened, my passenger and i looked at each other and at the same time said, "did you just see that?".  i consider myself a fairly intelligent person and i cannot figure what it could have been, neither can my friend. thank you.
content.summary: Disk-like object travels north at fast speed in north chicago-land area

content.detailedDescription:
This event occurred in 1947, i was 16 years old.  a friend and i were sitting across the street from a tavern when suddenly we saw 5 bright white lights coast into view and hovered above the tavern. it was triangle in shape.  we were both stunned wondering what this could be. the white lights turned from white to dark red.  they pulsated 7-8 times and turned into a bright red.  than the color changed to a dark green and again pulsated 7-8 times and turned to a bright green; than they returned back to white. we wanted to get a better look, but were afraid to go near it.
someone just outside of the tavern saw it and before we knew it a group of 6 adults were looking. they were directly under it looking up at it.
we heard and adult say, "what is it and what is keeping it up there?" and another adult say, "sh listen."  "listen to what?" was the response.

we were about to cross the street to join the others when suddenly, this thing took off from zero to infinity in 4 seconds.

i told my parents about the event and they just laughed at it.  two days later, my pop came home with a paper talking about the flying saucer that crashed in the desert of arizona.  

my friend called me and asked, "do you think that is what we saw?"  at that time i had never heard of flying saucers or ufo's.  it has puzzled me over the years and i know what i saw and experienced.  it was real.
content.summary: five bright trinagle in shape lights

content.detailedDescription:
On a summer evening in what i can closest calculate as june 1977. i was 14 years old. i was traveling home by car with my mother from manteca,ca to ripon,ca.It was about 9pm pst and my mom noticed lights hovering above a almond orchard about 1 1/2 miles from us. it was a dark no moon night and the lights really stood out as odd. the lights were hovering and moving slowly back and forth over a particular section of the orchard. my mother said we should go find it and see what is going on. she said she thought it was a helicopter looking for something.
we drove following the lights until we got about 1/4th miles from them. at this point, it changed direction and started to move straight south. my mother drove very fast and we got ahead of the lights and she pulled over on the side of another almond orchard. it was so dark out there in that part of the rural manteca area.
i got out of the pickup on the side right in the orchard of trees. i was standing by my seat in the corner of the door car part. my mother would not get out and kept asking me to get back inside. i asked her if she could see it coming. there was no sound at all, nothing. no wind that night not one leaf rustling just dead quiet. she yelled that it was coming and i looked up towards the north to the back of the pickup and it was there. now we saw the shape of it. it was a massive black triangle with lights on the corners that were very bight illuminating white. the object did not make any sound at all of any kind. if you were not looking at it , you would not know it was right there over your head. when it passed over us, i was amazed at how low it was, right on the trees. i think it was about 30ft above my head as it passed over. i could not see the lights as it passed me because it was too big. it blocked out the sky, i remember seeing a dark black so black it was blacker than the surrounding sky. the black was unbelievably black. i would say it was at least the size of three houses. incredibly huge. it was quite thick as well. it did not bend up on top in a curve, completely flat all over on top. it was about 30ft. thick all over. it was moving so slow it seemed at times to not be moving at all. but it was moving. it went over us, and straight along that first 20 rows of trees to the south. my mother at this point was freaking out and we starting driving to the south to follow, then my mom suddenly stopped the truck in the middle of the road and said she was afraid, we should not follow. she made a u turn and we went another way home, still rural but far from that thing. i watched the lights keep moving south until i just could not see it anymore. my mother died in 2004. she told me not to talk about it in our little town of ripon,ca where everyone knows everyone. so i did not. i don't think it was discussed much between me and my mother until my first son was about 14 years old, then she told him about it. back in 1977, there just was not a black triangle awareness and me and my mom did not know what to think it was. now that more and more people are speaking of it and there own sightings, i feel a little better about the whole thing. i know they exist because i saw one long long ago in that field that summer night. i could of thrown a stick and hit it. i know it was there, just don not know what it was.
content.summary: Witnessed lights above almond orchard at night. followed for 15 minutes. stopped object flew overhead and to the south out of sight. black massive triangle shape, no sound. three bright lights attatched.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at newmans wetlands in atlanta about 6 miles from the airport.
i never noticed it untill i processed my photos weeks later...Thought it was a bird but it was to big to be that far away...This shot was at the horizon...I've attached it you can see for yorselves. august 21, 2013 at 4:49 pm....It's gone in the next frame 20 seconds later...If you expand the frame it looks like a disc...Not a bird or plane.???? it's just a blip on the horizon in the middle of the frame just above the tree line.
content.summary: A black disc like orb way on the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: A very large pulsating orange round craft that glided in the sky in a straight line. lit up the entire sky. crazy!
content.summary: Very large orange round gliding silently

content.detailedDescription:
Fire like orb emerged from the west just over the roof top
of a house.  objected was about 3/4 size of a full moon glowing red/orange.
objected was moving east, northeast and turning to the north gaining
altitude. orb headed north diminishing as it gained altitude. objected
vanished about 10 degrees north of the zenith.
content.summary: Ufo: fire like orb

content.detailedDescription:
Saw objects three different times
-first was early spring 
-second two were two weeks apart, last happened this past saturday

i take out trash at about 11:30pm every night. the first instance occurred late last spring. i looked up, and saw an outline of an extremely large triangular object with six round white lights on the bottom, moving north with no sound at all. it wasn't moving fast. the second two were about two weeks apart in time, but were the same object. the first time i thought it was a very large piece of plastic rolling along with the wind. but i thought that was strange as it was moving at a high rate of speed. these were both very similar, and spotted both moving the same path from north to south.

1. at home outside.
2. looked up at sky, no cloud cover with all three, and first was almost directly overhead.
3. first object i have no idea. it was in a shape of a triangle, black with six round white lights. second two, the first time i thought it was a very long rolled up piece of plastic, but it was moving faster than a jet would travel, which i thought was strange. the second time it was brighter, moving the same rate of speed in the same direction, and then just disappeared. there was no sound with any of these objects.
4. first object i saw was moving north, almost overhead, with six lights. second two were moving south.
5. first object i became very numb, with chills going down my spine. the object was about 1000ft almost directly above me. i still get chills thinking about it because it was extremely large, about the size of a 757, with no sound at all. the second two i am still confused about.
6. all eventually disappeared.
content.summary: Very large triangle with six white lights, two others with light emitting

content.detailedDescription: Round or oval
content.summary: Round then got bigger

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of around june of 2012 aproxamately 11pm while crosing the jaques cartier bridge i noticed orblike lights in the sky looking out of the window of the car my first thought was hey cool a ufo to fast to be a plane the sky was almost black the orbs moved around increased by 1 as they were moving in a triangular shape then danced around after about 10 minutes it kept hovering afterwards we left when it started hovering i wanted to take a picture with my cell but it had died and i was stuck with no evidence.  i was very intrigued by this experience and wanted more.

 i went outside after iriving home it left me feeling exited  and i wanted to see it again or for more time if i were the driver i would have stoped to keep looking till it disapeared.
content.summary: Orb like lights dancing in the sky at night no ship seen.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the end of my friends street filming a trailer for a movie that we were making and that's when i noticed it. i was doing an around the corner pan and i then say a straight line of red glowing orbs with an orange-yellow illumination. at first i thought it was just a standard passenger plane but my thoughts changed when it quickly split into a triangle shape and went faster. it consisted of twelve dots in total. they moved in an odd pattern almost like molecules in a solid, moving around in close quarters, and then finally they morphed into a triangular shape. the dots stayed like that for a while until they moved into a diamond shape, then a straight line, and zoomed off. i felt like i was the only one seeing it and when i looked at my friend, he had a clod stare, an unbelieving stare, him being a tough guy i knew that for something to scare him and me that it was not fake. i also felt a little chill and twitched a little bit after seeing it. the following days i was sleepless and couldn't get the image out of my head. i lost sight of the object as it flew over the south east horizon towards the woods, and it also went faster than anything i'd seen in my life.
content.summary: Filming video when i saw a triangular shape of red orbs. it then split and went back together quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
what i had seen was an orb, perfectly spherical and blue.  not emitting a glow, but a completely self-contained light that encompassed the entire orb.  it was faster than anything i had ever seen before but it did not accelerate, decelerate or gain or lose altitude.  it stayed completely consistent in all aspects of movements.  i was in my back yard at about 8:15 pm est. when i saw it zip across the sky from north to south in an arching path.  it didn���t fade away, it continued across the sky extremely quickly until it was out of view.  there were low spotty clouds that may have covered it from view but i saw it perfectly through them.  they didn���t affect my view of it.  the object couldn���t have been more than 1000 or so feet above the ground (still some clouds lower than it).  after i brought it up to a trusted relative, he said he had seen the same type of craft in north jersey only green
	origanaly i thought it was a shooting star but it was obviously not.  afterwords i felt a little scared but mostly facinated.

this was like nothing i had seen before and i hope others saw it as well.
content.summary: A defined blue orb perfectly zooming across the sky maintaining speed and altitude completely silently.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the second floor of my cabin ten feet off the ground. i also live in a remote place. i was woken by a high pitched sound approaching from the north. i then went to the window on the west side of the bedroom to see what it was. it must have been moving fast as it approached, the sound last about thirty seconds but went away as it slowly past by over a hill in a pasture. as i watched those colors of black orange and red blend into each other it look like liquid metal. i felt a sense of aw when i saw them, they must have come from earth. i have seen this metal before while passing through a military base in mississippi two thirty in the morning, there was a test taking place. roads were blocked off every where as i slowly past by looking from the main road. they were very suspicious of me. i saw floating over the tree tops what look like plasma blending together in colors of red, black, orange, and green only to see the process start over again as it float by at tree top level. earlier before this took place, about twenty minutes, i saw a rocket go up and explode, from its center it burst out energy in the shape of a sphere. the two ufo���s i saw have been two of many. there is a much greater story that involves nasa over a period of forty years if you want to here it, but i will only tell it if ask, there is much more to these two ufo's, or spaceships.
content.summary: .Two past slowly by

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging out with my brother and cousin outside of our house having a conversation. we noticed blue like light with the corner of our eyes and saw massive sphere/circle appear behind some thin clouds. it descended vertically for 10 seconds. in the last 3 seconds the object brightened so intense that the night seemed like day. there were three of us outside the house, but at our neighbors house there was a get together and i assume they saw it because they yelled at the sight of it showing itself. this is not the first time we see the objects. this year has been a year of these sightings that im curious as to why all of a sudden they're appearing more and more.
content.summary: Sun(2x) like object with neon blue and white color.

content.detailedDescription:
This photo was taken on the night of 29 august 2005. the invisible object looks like a worm. 

please add this attached picutre to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Sky worm like

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my front door when i saw something coming from the north. at first i thought it could be a bird. i kept watching as it slowly cam closer. it was soon apparent that it wasn't a bird so i stepped outside the front of my house and watch it approach. as it cam closer, i called my neighbor over to show her. we both watched for about 3 minutes as 6 objects floated by, slightly to the west of us. there were 4 elongated oil barrel shaped objects and 2 round object that were either much father away, or just much smaller. all 6 objects stayed in formation the entire time as they ever so slowly floated by, never wobbeling of changing position. as they floated by, they seemed to be gaining altitude and accended higher and higher until they dissapead behing the clouds. this took place during the day at about 1pm. they were about a mile high in the sky and as they passed they seemed to get higher and higher. this happed on 12/7/13. as the first elongated oil barrel looking object went by, it looked like some kind of vortex was surrounding it, however that could have been a trick of the eye, i don't know. each elongated oil barrler objet looked as though they were at least a mile or more apart from each other, one behind the next. in between 1st and 2nd as well as the 3rd and 4th were 2 tiny round dark objects alsom traveling the same slow speed and also staying equidistant from one an other. the oil barrels ufos were on their side with their sides (or what would be their top and bottem if they were actual oil barrels) pointing east and west while they were floating south.Judging from the size, i would say each oil barrel objet was about the size of a football field. there was no noise, and no lights. i didn't want to move because i was hopping to see them excelerate or do something unusual, so i didn't get my camara. the entire thing lasted about 3 minutes.
content.summary: It looked like an elongated oil barrel

content.detailedDescription:
I got out of my friend's house in glendora and when i was walking to my car i saw 4 orange bright lights just hovering towards south. 

the lights were just hovering and slowly two started vanishing into the sky and 3 minutes after the other two got a little brighter than usual and then they vanish too.
content.summary: 4 orange lights

content.detailedDescription: In the sky
content.summary: Like a ball,same to venus.
content.locationName: San José de Maipo, Santiago Metropolitan Region

content.detailedDescription:
December 08, 2013 pearland, texas at 9:27 pm my son was taking out the recycling when he came running inside yelling to me and telling me that there was a weird object moving in the sky in circles from left to right. i went outside and noticed the strange movements and the change of colors. i called my husband and we could not believe this was happening to us.  it sure was something that we had not seen before. it kept moving for about a minute. the object was moving too fast and irregularly to be an airplane or a helicopter, and also the color pattern was not something we had ever seen. my husband went inside to grab his camera, and as he was coming out, it moved quickly, flashed, then disappeared. after 2 seconds, there was a loud thunder-like noise, yet there was no rain or thunder before of after this happened. no good pictures were able to be taken, just one cellphone picture, which just looks like a small bright dot in the dark. i'll still attach the picture anyways. there were no visible stars on this night. this was really strange. what could this have been? i have heard of weather balloons, but i don't think this was one.

has anybody seen something like this before?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Distant starlike orb with bright changing colors moving in circles from left to right

content.detailedDescription: Went out to take garbage out...Looked up into the sky and saw 3 large orange/red light hovering in sky...No sound, much larger and brighter than stars. went back into the house and got my husband...We stood in the front yard watching the eastern sky until the middle light suddenly vanished then the left light vanished and then the right light vanished...They did not get smaller, they were the same size the entire time..
content.summary: 3 orange/red lights in eastern sky hovering

content.detailedDescription:
It was 6:00 p.M. time to walk our dog behind our apartment . my wife and i started down our driveway and when got out back she noticed it first and when she pointed it out to me i was stunned. very close overhead this brilliant red star just hovered above us not making a sound. i observed it for about 10 seconds at which time it started assending slowly. i started screaming for my daughter and ran inside my apartment  to get my camcorder.When i returned out back it was still visable but not bright enough to record. i have seen and recorded both day and night several strange sightings since moving to this area twito years ago so i usually have my camcorder with me at all times but not this time. what ever this was it definitly was there for me to see it. it was like seeing the star of bethlehem .As amazed as i was by this it pales in comparison to a close encounter i had with two friends around 1974 in eastbridgewater, mass. when i had a sighting of a dome shaped ufo hovering nearby and was emitting sparks .The sighting lasted around 25 minutes and culminated with it going directly over our heads just above the trees.It was as big as a house and made no sound. i have
 had so many strange sightings in my past i feel this wont be the last time
content.summary: My wife and i walked our dog behind our apartment and there it was bright red hovered no sound no more than a quarter mile overhead reminded me of the star of bethlehem

content.detailedDescription:
Playing with google maps and noticed a siver oval object appxm 2000 ft up facing nne
see for yourself. google maps, street view : 6 san marin drive, novato ca-facing nne, pan up and zoom in a little. not sure what date they ran the googlemobile in this neighborhood.
content.summary: On google maps 6 san marin drive, novato ca facing nne

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,

we were having our tea last night around 5.45pm and i noticed the crescent moon  and then i noticed a really bright light that we thought was a ufo although with a little bit research learned was venus as despite having a slight knowledge ,
of the night sky,  i am no patrick moore .
we got out basic  binoculars and had a closer look at venus .
to our amazement ,and only through binocs we could see a saucer shape object hovering horizontally ,just left of venus that was grey in colour and illuminated and sat stationary in that position for at least 5 minutes as we all took turns with the binocs.

as i took about a minute trying to take a photo using my iphone through the binocular lense "attached" when i returned to observe  the object again through binocs it was now on the right hand side of venus and was no longer stationary and now moving  ,still horizontally ,about the same speed as an aircraft appears to fly through the sky ,and then disappeared or fizzled out about the same distance we had first observed it left of venus but now on the right.

strange thing is ,as when i looked at the picture on phone ,and as can be seen ,the object appears to be pointing vertical and it definitely was sitting horizontal and stationary whilst i was trying to ready the camera as my wife and daughter confirmed.

we are not ufo hunters and our attention was mainly drawn to venus as it was really bright last night in the southern sky .
my wife suggested that it may appear vertical in the picture if i maybe took pic at wrong angle ,although the tree line is visible so that can't be explanation ?

1 pics taken on iphone showing venus and said object to the left and is also in focus quite well as we seen.
two other close up captures of the original pic also attached.

any help would be great to possibly explaining this for us .As you couldn't see this object with the naked eye and i think i was lucky to capture the image through a basic binoc lense with the iphone too as it is clear as looking through the binoculars .

thanks,

john millar.
dunfermline
content.summary: Unusual freaky amazing

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 10 pm and i was in the front passenger seat on my way to the theater in napa. i noticed the passengers in the car next to me had their windows rolled down and wer filming something with their phones. 

we made the turn to get on the street where the theater is on and i saw what looked like an airplane flying in the sky, a bright far away light moving slowly in a straight line. then i noticed more lights moving behind the first one. there was a total of 4-5 lights moving slowly and close together in a straight line across the sky. i opened my window to see if they were making any noise and they weren't. after about a minute, they all disappeared except the one in front leading. after about 30 seconds, that one disappeared as well.
content.summary: 4-5 light objects flying slowly in a straight line then dissapearing

content.detailedDescription:
(while driving)i noticed lights in the sky as i began slowing down to a stoplight. i watched them for awhile trying to figure out what they were...Thinking they must be from a kid's toy or something, i actually got out my phone to take a video of it to send as a joke to mock my friend's belief in aliens/ufos (i'm a skeptic) shortly after i began recording, the stoplight turned green so i wasn't able to capture anymore of it but once i looked at it...& the more & more i look at it & try to think of what it could be i can't come up with anything. 

there's a total of 4 lights in my video...3 on the left & 1 on the right:
the 3 different lights on the left beam then go dim then change shape 1 of the 3 almost looking like a shooting star only these lights were way too large to be stars. the light on the right doesn't change shape or flash. it just shoots downwards but not straight down. it's moving & does somewhat of an "s" motion downwards.Looking at the span of sky this light covered & the speed it's moving, it can't possibly be a kid's toy (which is originally what i thought it was). it's definitely not an airplane or any other "normal" aircraft you'd see in the sky & with it being so cold out i just don't see it being created by humans.

whether a ufo or not, it has to be something but i can't figure out what it is. the fact they're not even doing the same things, it's winter out, it was high up, takes up a huge span of space, changed shape & motion, went at a super fast speed, & nothing that i've ever seen before...Unexplainable to me...I'm really interested in find out what it was.
content.summary: I was stopped at a stoplight trying to figure out what the lights in the sky were...Till i finally realized i had a smartphone & took a video.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside when a fairly large portion of the sky above me lit up bright green. it looked like lightning. then it lit up a lighter shade of green when it trailed off. maybe 3 seconds later, i heard a distant boom or pop. i know it was no asteroid or meteor. i've seen a meteor before and this wasn't one.
it looked like it flew away only all i saw was light.
my feelings were, "how cool! what was that?"
content.summary: A bright green flash that lit up the sky, then turned a lighter green as it flew away then disappeared. then i heard a boom.

content.detailedDescription: Observed 4 to 5 objects that seemed to fade in and out and appear in different locations. one of the the ufos ascends up and hovers for about 2 seconds. then descends in an s pattern at unknown speeds. there was no wind, no clouds, no planes on sight. have to turn screen sideways to view. (control alt right arrow)
content.summary: Observed multiple ufos which seemed to fade in an out. made no noise. one does s pattern at unknown speeds

content.detailedDescription: On this date we were heading towards iowa for the weekend and my husband noticed a a vertical contrail and pointed it out. he also noticed a flash at that moment that appeared to be headed towards the clouds above. so he told me to take a few pictures which i did with my cell phone. later that evening we were looking at the pictures and noticed something in that we did not see with our naked eye. we are not sure what it is but definitely not a bird. if you enlarge the picture,whatever the object is,there looks like a heat signature around it.  just kind of curious what it could possibly be. i included 2 pictures that were taken seconds apart.
content.summary: Black object discovered on photos taken with camera phone

content.detailedDescription: Had been scanning sky prior to ice storm with night vision. after an initial 15 minutes of scanning i picked up on prominent objects in the foreground that were not there earlier (sky was increasingly clouding over in advance of an ice storm). as minutes went by they became unmistakably apparent. after careful tracking i realized they were in motion and spent a total of 45 minutes tracking their movement from a glide path left-right to stationary rest, to movement of orbs within their groups which are evidenced in the video. there is a rod flyby in the video at the end. side note: i also caught a cloaked object (very large) moving through the sky at a much higher altitude...The night vision picked up its magnetic impulses disturbing the atmosphere and it moved se to nw. interestingly enough, there was absolutely no plane or helicopter activity in the sky the whole time the orbs were in view, which is extremely unusual in the richmond area.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple ufo orb groups over virginia
